idea:
TRNSGOLD designs and manufacture high-quality load carriers and truck bodies that are innovative in style and engineering whilst maintaining standards of reliability.

We design with a precision and quality to provide transport solutions to various companies. Highly experienced and qualified team of experts is hired by our company. Due to their in-depth knowledge and rich experience, we have been able to manufacture these products according to the specific requirements of the customers. Our experienced quality controllers keep a close eye on entire manufacturing process. We aim to satisfy all the requirements of the customer. We work as per the law to achieve high grade product.


Since its humble beginnings in AUG 2020, TRNSGOLD has continuously worked to improve its processes and manufacturing capabilities. Due to this commitment of continuous improvement, TRNSGOLD stands today with the most highly automated and technologically advanced equipment's and processes in the industry..

 TRNSGOLD took the process a step further and utilized the processes to improve virtually every area of the company from how orders are received and processed to the shipping of the product to the end customer.


Over its history, TRNSGOLD has strategically aligned itself with leading raw material suppliers and has developed long term relationships with them that mutually benefit both sides of the partnerships. As a result of these partnerships, cutting edge supply chain processes have been developed that cut down lead times, enhance the quality of the products and help to control costs. This enables TRNSGOLD to continue to provide its customers the highest quality and superior end products available in the industry. Some of our most common raw materials include:

 High Tensile Imported Steel which results in 15% more payload for the Customers which also results in better Mileage & longer life of vehicles.
name: TRNSGOLD ENGINEERING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: INFLUENZZAA is still an idea. The concept of INFLUENZZAA is a platform for social media influencers and brands . The main idea is to bring small to medium to large brands on the platform , have a look at these influencers portfolio and hire them through our platform according to their requirements. This would bring small companies to the influencing world and give them better marketing strategies. Our platform will include influencers from all social media platforms such as instagram , youtube , short video platforms and every other such platforms. The way more and more influencers are used for marketing , sparks an opportunity for platform like this. According to a brief research influencing is growing exponentially as a marketing tool and will continue to grow. This platform can go international as well as influence in the international market is very huge.
name: INFLUENZZAA

idea:
Manufactur3D™ (A division of Advanced Manufactur3D Market Research And Media Private Limited) is India’s Leading and Premier Online Magazine carved out for the 3D Printing Business community in India and globe. We offer latest news, market insights, accurate industry analysis and vital information pertaining to the Indian and Global 3D printing industry. Right from concept, design and prototyping to manufacturing and its applications, we cover the entire Manufacturing ecosystem of 3D printing industry.


India’s Leading and Premier 3D Printing Magazine and Media Company.

24×7 dedicated Global Platform for 3D Printing Industry

Leadership Team with Collective industry experience of 45+ years in Corporate Sector.


Close Network with 25K+ Engineers, Designers, Technical leaders, Owners, Business Heads, CXOs and Decision makers in Indian 3D Printing Industry.

Connected with all major global and Indian 3D Printing OEMs, Component Manufacturers, Service Providers, End Users and Education Institutes in India.


Connected with Automotive, Engineering, Government, Defense, Aerospace, Consumer Electronics & appliances, Tooling, Education and Medical Healthcare industries in India.


Working as Catalyst in building India’s 3D Printing ecosystem and drive 3D Printing Market growth in the region.
name: ADVANCED MANUFACTUR3D MARKET RESEARCH AND MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
